oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Raleigh Inn
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Raleigh; Raleigh Inn; hotels; resorts; recreation; mineral springs;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The brochure for the 1903 season at Raleigh Inn. Describes Raleigh Springs, the Inn, meals, activities, the composition of the various springs, and future plans for the conversion of the Raleigh Inn into the Maddox Seminary for Young Ladies.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Maddox, A. S.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: A. N. Kellogg Newspaper Co., Little Rock, Ark.
